attributes.agent_name: Motus Ford Kempton Park Used Cars
attributes.description:
Don't Miss Out, Call Us Today, or Leave Your Details and We Will Call You.

Finance Can Be Arranged, Nationwide Delivery, Trade-ins Welcome, Spare Keys, Full Service History At Agents.

Price Excludes Documentation and Registration Costs E&OE

As one of the many Motus Ford Pre-owned dealerships, we pride ourselves in excellent service and offer vehicles that can be trusted and enjoyed. Customer satisfaction is our main priority! Motus Ford, Drive Away Smiling.

attributes.title: 2019 Toyota Quantum 2.8 GL 14 Seat

attributes.description:
Finance Is Available With All The Major Banks As We Are Approved Dealers. Please Come And Visit Our Used Car Manager And Our Business Manager
They Will Be Able To Arrange A Taylor Made Deal Structure To Match Your Pocket Over A Lovely Cup Of Coffee At Our Bistro. Trade-ins Welcome And We Pay Top Prices For Good Clean Vehicles. First Time To Finance
Our Finance And Insurance Manager Will Assist You Step By Step Throughout Your Process. There Are Great Warranty Options Available For This Vehicle And Other Great Products. Should You Require Further Information Or You Would Like To Arrange A Test Drive Please Do Not Hesitate To Contact Us At Motus Toyota Strijdom Park.

attributes.title: 2017 Hyundai H-1 2.4 CVVT | Executive

attributes.description:
The sporty i20 N Line comes in white or red with a black two-tone roof. Inside, you can look forward to the iconic black artificial leather interior with red N line trim. Safety & comfort also go hand in hand with this high-performance hatchback featuring ABS + ESC + HAC & Auto Temp Control Air Con.
The sporty i20 N Line comes in white or red with a black two-tone roof. Inside, you can look forward to the iconic black artificial leather interior with red N line trim. Safety & comfort also go hand in hand with this high-performance hatchback featuring ABS + ESC + HAC & Auto Temp Control Air Con.
From the interior finish and layout to the exterior, the new i20 is a display of daring style and unforgettable memories waiting to happen. It comes complete with comprehensive safety features for the road ahead, and a host of premium features to be enjoyed by you and your crew.
